User's Guide
============

The documentation in this chapter contains the information that is relevant for
you, if you are an instrument responsible or you are a user and want to see what
commands are available to you. For information on how to configure the system
using setups please check :doc:`installconfig`.

   :maxdepth: 1

   commands
   userscripts
   gui/invocation
   ipython
